title: datalad run does not save staged changes
body:
#### What is the problem?
I command I am running already stages (`git rm`, and `git add`) changes to be committed. `datalad run` then seems to not save anything
```shell
(git)hopa:~datalad/distributions/datalad-feedstock[0.10.0]git
$> datalad run conda smithy regenerate
[INFO   ] == Command start (output follows) ===== 
Setting build platform. This is only useful when pretending to be on another platform, such as for rendering necessary dependencies on a non-native platform. I trust that you know what you're doing.
Setting build arch. This is only useful when pretending to be on another arch, such as for rendering necessary dependencies on a non-native arch. I trust that you know what you're doing.
Adding in variants from internal_defaults
Adding in variants from /home/yoh/anaconda-4.4.0-3.6/conda_build_config.yaml
Re-rendered with conda-smithy 3.1.5 and pinning 2018.05.22
You can commit the changes with:

    git commit -m "MNT: Re-rendered with conda-smithy 3.1.5 and pinning 2018.05.22"

These changes need to be pushed to github!

[INFO   ] == Command exit (modification check follows) ===== 
Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'add', '--verbose', '--', u'.circleci/config.yml', u'.ci_support/linux_python2.7.yaml'] under '/home/yoh/proj/datalad/distributions/datalad-feedstock'. Exit code=128. out= err=fatal: pathspec '.ci_support/linux_python2.7.yaml' did not match any files
fatal: pathspec '.ci_support/linux_python2.7.yaml' did not match any files
datalad run conda smithy regenerate  8.65s user 0.72s system 88% cpu 10.551 total
(dev) 1 32885 ->128.....................................:Wed 13 Jun 2018 09:43:41 AM PDT:.
(git)hopa:~datalad/distributions/datalad-feedstock[0.10.0]git
$> git status
On branch 0.10.0
Your branch is ahead of 'gh-regro-cf-autotick-bot/0.10.0' by 1 commit.
  (use "git push" to publish your local commits)

Changes to be committed:
  (use "git reset HEAD <file>..." to unstage)

	deleted:    .ci_support/linux_python2.7.yaml
	modified:   .circleci/config.yml

cached/staged changes:                                                                                          
 .ci_support/linux_python2.7.yaml |  6 ------
 .circleci/config.yml             | 18 ------------------
```
